cause.description:
We are a small none profit wildlife santuary, we have a facility with 12 wolves and 9 hybreds at the moment, we are the 7th larges in the U.S.A. We are trying to inform the public that the wolf is neccesary in the wild. We teach the facts of wolves, good or bad.
1. We need the wolves to have a heathy ecosystem
2. wolves arn't cattle stalkers.
3. wolves need to be on the endagerd spieces list
4. wolves are not the fairy tale villains they have been made out to be
cause.mission: Presurve the wolf, and inform the public
cause.name: Wolf Keep WildLife Sanctuary
